| History                 = The '''United States Marshals Service''' was a federal prison police agency operating in the [[United States of America]] as part of the [[United States Department of Justice (Earth-616)|Justice Department]]. The agents are called U.S. Marshals and are tasked with providing for the transfer of prisoners and chasing fugitives in case of evasion.
